alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:14PM EDT until July 13 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greenup County in northeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Carter County in northeastern Kentucky... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Load, or 11 miles north of Carter Caves State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Greenup, Load, Greenbo Lake, Oldtown, Wurtland, Hopewell, Brushart and Warnock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
